text: Pyrithyldione (Presidon, Persedon) is a psychoactive drug invented in 1949. An improved method of manufacture was patented by Roche in 1959. It was used as a hypnotic or sedative and presumed to be less toxic than barbiturates. Today, this substance is no longer used. Agranulocytosis was sometimes reported as adverse effect. == See also == * Methyprylon * Piperidione * Glutethimide == References == Category:Hypnotics Category:Lactams Category:Ketones Category:Piperidines Category:GABAA receptor positive allosteric modulators Category:Abandoned drugs
